short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accessibility tool that leverages AI to provide suggestions for improving the accessibility of web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool by developers for developers that leverages AI assisted technology to assess accessibility standards under the WCAG 2.1 guild lines
